Summary: bright light in sky grew brighter and then moved much like shooting star
divs: Sighting Detailscoming home from working second shift.just turned south onto fleetwood from freeland rd. i noticed what looked like a very large star(several times larger than a star), i then noticed it seemed to get to get brighter at that exact second it moved in a rather large J shape toward the horizen and then looked to slow down and flutter to near horizen and faded to black. when i first noticed it seemed to look like large star after i seen it i was totaly amazed that a shooting star could move like that. now not so sure that's possible. I have over my 50 years seen several unusual shooting stars. including several times, large shooting stars explode,once seen a shooting star skip several times across the sky and have seen shooting stars flutter to earth. lost sight of object as faded to black near horizen
